long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables web automation capabilities for your AI powered MaxGPT workflows (hosted at maxflow.ai).

Automate tasks using:
- Built in actions such as click, find, fill in, or get attribute
- Custom user scripts for more complicated tasks

Here are some ideas to get started with:
- Filling out search forms and sending the results back to your MaxGPT workflow 
- Retrieving order information from online stores
- Filling out and submitting tickets
- Automating online payments
